summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley between Block 9, Assessor's Plat of University Heights Addition, and Block 1, Shelton's Addition, Block 1, Pettit's University Addition, being the alley between 12th Avenue Northeast and Brooklyn Avenue, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 98715 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
